name: Fastcoin (FST)
short_description:
Fastcoin - Celebrating over one year of fast & secure transactions, all of which confirm in 48 seconds. It's no wonder people all over the world choose Fastcoin. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Total coins will be 165,888,000.
- 12 second block target
- Custom unique difficulty algorithm. 
- Retargets once every hour or 300 blocks. 
- Each block contains 32 coins which will be halved every year (or 2,592,000 blocks). 
- (Currenly 16 coins per block.)
- 4 confirmations per transaction.
- Ports: connection 9526, RPC 9527.
------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
Download the bootstrap.dat file a quicker sync time. https://archive.org/details/fastcoin_bootstrap
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Info and How-To:
http://www.fastcointalk.org/index.php/topic,194.msg773.html#msg773

New Blazing Fast Wallets
Windows - Mac - Linux - Android & Multibit
summary: The fastest software-based online payment system
